text: Chilkhaajavyn Avday (; b. 1943) is a Mongolian engineer and politician. He is a member of the Mongolian Academy of Sciences. == Awards == * People's Teacher () of Mongolia Ч.Авдай ШУТИС-ийн “Хүндэт доктор” цол хүртэв (Mongolian University of Science and Technology) * Honorary degree (Mongolian University of Science and Technology) ==References== Category:Mongolian politicians Category:Mongolian engineers Category:People's Teacher of Mongolia Category:National University of Mongolia alumni Category:1943 births Category:Living people
title: Chilkhaajavyn Avday
